segments.text: Why do you want to be a tour guide ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like to travel and I also like meeting various kinds of people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What courses have you completed at college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have studied English , tourist culture , guiding methods and techniques and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you learned any other foreign languages ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have learned Japanese as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know that is a hard job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know . But I don't mind working hard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything you want to ask about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I only wish that you could give me a definite answer to my application as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
